1.text: Use a potting mixture meant for orchids.

2.text: Gently pour water over the potting mixture.

3.text: Use half or a quarter strength fertilizer meant for orchids.

4.text: Your orchid needs 8 hours of indirect sunlight each day.

5.text: During the day, keep the temperature at 19–30 °C (66–86 °F).

6.text: Trim the flowering stalk back to the second node under the flowers.

7.text: This usually ends up being about every 2 years.

8.text: Check your orchids for bugs often to avoid any damage they can cause!
